channel.title: error on Ma1icious' Blog
channel.description: Recent content in error on Ma1icious' Blog

item.title: Solution to the ssh error 'no matching host key type found. Their offer: ssh-rsa'
item.description: Introduction When using SSH-related commands, the following errors may occur: Ma1icious@host bin % scp hackfile root@192.168.1.7:/root Unable to negotiate with 192.168.1.7 port 22: no matching host key type found. Their offer: ssh-rsa scp: Connection closed Solution 1 This can be solved by adding -oHostKeyAlgorithms=+ssh-rsa to the executed command, as shown below: Ma1icious@host bin % scp -oHostKeyAlgorithms=+ssh-rsa hackfile root@192.168.1.7:/root The authenticity of host '192.168.1.7 (192.168.1.7)' can't be established. RSA key fingerprint is SHA256:E5pAVK3/y+4WjslWOGtUIEcWgFRZZQFKtHDM161vldM.
